name: Stake the Snake and the Wake of Snake (Including Brake the Brake)
name_original: Stake the Snake and the Wake of Snake (Including Brake the Brake)
description:
In Stake the Snake and the Wake of Snake (Including Brake the Brake) you wake Stake the Snake and partake in mistakes (with brake the brake).

Inspired by Sokoban style games, as well as The Witness and Understand, this game aims to merge multiple styles of puzzle game into one. Currently this game only have a small handful of levels, but it is always possible that I will update the game in the future! (I say after only updating any game every a single time.) Anyways, hopefully this game will be like fun or something.

Sorry if this game feels incomplete. It was primarily created to mess around with some game mechanics, so it lacks some features, such as audio or a tutorial. 

Credit to 8TempesT8 for the.. name.
